RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to t he Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEQUILA EMPIRE perfect position to far turn, rallied up into the stretch to be along in time. VOGELSANG saved ground far turn kept on in the stretch grinding for place. VITA DE VITO inside speed to the front, cantered along to far turn, weakened. WITCHING HOUR chased leader to far turn with nothing left in the stretch run. LADY BIRD KISSES no speed throughout while showing little. DOODLE DOO tried to keep up with no advancement throughout. KEENE ON JENNY widest run first turn, stayed off rail to far turn while fading. LITTLE RIOT GRRL always outrun. All Turf Races will be hand timed due to a broken sensor.

ENTRY.NAME: Vogelsang
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground far turn kept on in the stretch grinding for place

ENTRY.NAME: Little Riot Grrl
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Vita de Vito
ENTRY.OWNER: Belmar Racing and Breeding LLC and Fiore de Vito
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, cantered along to far turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Bird Kisses
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed throughout while showing little

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: perfect position to far turn, rallied up into the stretch in time

ENTRY.NAME: Witching Hour
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to far turn with nothing left in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Doodle Doo
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up with no advancement throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Keene On Jenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: widest run first turn, stayed off rail to far turn while fading

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 8, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Regist ered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY TOMMY LEE between horses to the lead, well handled, dueled, cleared off in the final sixteenth. C C'S WORLD pressured winner to the turn and stretch, best of the rest. MARKET OF STOCKS raced along evenly from the turn while evenly for show spot. SWEET TOOTSIE LU never menaced. LUNARCHY chased pace to quarter pole, came up empty in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Tootsie Lu
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Market of Stocks
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from the turn while evenly for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: My Tommy Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to the lead, well handled, dueled, cleared off

ENTRY.NAME: C C's World
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured winner to the turn and stretch, best of the rest

ENTRY.NAME: Lunarchy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to quarter pole, came up empty in the stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 9100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 8, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARDLY MISCHIEVOUS tracked three wide to backstretch in hand, rallied to go well clear in the final sixteenth. SLY WINK tardy from the gate, saved ground throughout, up for place late. YOU'RE A DANDY set a leisurely pace to quarter pole, pressured, lost place late. SHORT ON THE SUGAR saved ground to no avail with no late gain in the stretch run. GET CLEAR saved ground throughout to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Sly Wink
ENTRY.COMMENT: tardy from the gate, saved ground throughout, up for place late

ENTRY.NAME: You're a Dandy
ENTRY.COMMENT: set a leisurely pace to quarter pole, pressured, lost place late

ENTRY.NAME: Get Clear
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Hardly Mischievous
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing and Cory Moelis Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked three wide to backstretch in hand, rallied to go clear

ENTRY.NAME: Short On the Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to no avail with no late gain in the stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ARTEMUS EAGLE tracking trio for three quarters, grinded from far turn in time. NO HANG CHARLIE up inside around first turn, dueled on lead stretch run outgamed. ESTILO PELIGROSO saved ground to far turn with minimal gain for show spot. CONGRATS THIS no speed to far turn passed tired ones in the stretch run. EMPEROR'S GOLD broke well outside, dueled to far turn, nothing left in stretch. CACAHUETE speed between horses to far turn, shifted inside but came up empty in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Estilo Peligroso
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to far turn with minimal gain for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Congrats This
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn passed tired ones in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: No Hang Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: up inside around first turn, dueled on lead stretch run outgamed

ENTRY.NAME: Artemus Eagle
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracking trio for three quarters, grinded from far turn in time

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 121 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OFFICE CHATTER sharp to the front, lead all calls under a hand ride to the wire in impressive fashion. SHE IS DYNAMIC chased winner throughout to no avail while best of the rest. PRIDE AND ATTITUDE broke awkward from the gate, rushed to chase top pair to no avail. LATE BLOOMBOPPER always trailed at all calls while far back, crossing the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Office Chatter
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Ella D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the front, lead all calls under a hand ride to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Late Bloombopper
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed far back while crossing the wire

ENTRY.NAME: She Is Dynamic
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner throughout to no avail while best of the rest

ENTRY.NAME: Pride and Attitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkward from the gate, rushed to chase top pair

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 57. Claiming Purse 16100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 8, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Consid ered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILLIE JONES battled from inside early, rallied up rail in the stretch to go clear under stout handling to the wire. RUN BUBBA RUN no speed to the turn, four wide run into stretch for place spot. HONOR THE D speed between horses early on could not keep up settled third. TEQUILA FLATS dueled early on, spurted clear turn, dueled stretch, faltered. HEIDI'S SINATRA always trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Willie Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled from inside early, rallied up rail in the stretch, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Honor the D
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between horses early on could not keep up settled third

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Flats
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early on, spurted clear turn, dueled stretch, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi's Sinatra
ENTRY.OWNER: Eyerman, Lee J. and Molumby, John
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Run Bubba Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn, four wide run into stretch for place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 8, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claim ing Price $16,000 (Any Maiden Races, And Only Claiming Races And Only Starter Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARILLO unhurried from gate, angled out into stretch with a late , along in time. MONEY RUN speed to the front dictated pace to stretch, outkicked to wire. DROPPIN G'S good position to far turn three wide run, bid stretch, outkicked. TEQUILAS RANGER unhurried throughout with no response when needed in the stretch. OUT WORK'N tracked leader to the stretch, could not keep up in the drive. AZURE SKY unhurried from the gate and trailed throughout in a dull effort.

ENTRY.NAME: Carillo
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried from gate, angled out into stretch, along in time

ENTRY.NAME: Money Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front dictated pace to stretch, outkicked to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 5F Turf CR: 71. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 8, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To H orses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAPPYKIYAY hopped from the gate, rushed between horses, dueled stretch cleared off under stout handling to the wire. BLUE LILY bobbled start, rushed to the front, stayed well outgamed to wire. ZERO CLICK three wide run to the turn never far back, ran on evenly stretch. SYLLABUS no speed to turn, improved position from outside in late going. WANNAGOCAMPING raced along evenly from outside throughout. AWESOME VALOR saved ground to turn, in tight 5/16p backed out, kept on. SLENDER BETSY between horses to the turn close up, gave way readily in the lane. SCAPITURE outsprinted from the gate and never in contention. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the TURF course, all races run on the turf going forward will be hand time until further notice.

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Valor
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to turn, in tight turn, backed out, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Lily
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, rushed to the front, stayed well outgamed to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Slender Betsy
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to the turn close up, gave way readily in the lane

ENTRY.NAME: Happykiyay
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped from the gate, rushed between horses, cleared off

ENTRY.NAME: Syllabus
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to turn, improved position from outside in late going

ENTRY.NAME: Zero Click
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide run to the turn never far back, ran on evenly stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Scapiture
ENTRY.COMMENT: outsprinted from the gate and never in contention

ENTRY.NAME: Wannagocamping
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from outside through the stretch run
